name: IT Knowledge Finder
description: Retrieves IT solutions, troubleshooting guides, and documentation from organizational knowledge bases to accelerate ticket resolution.

friction_addressed.description: Time wasted searching for solutions in fragmented knowledge bases
Tribal knowledge trapped in individuals' heads and scattered documentation

data_sources.name: IT Knowledge Base
data_sources.description: Knowledge base articles, FAQs, and troubleshooting guides

data_sources.name: Runbooks & Procedures
data_sources.description: Step-by-step procedures for common issues and system administration

data_sources.name: System Documentation
data_sources.description: Configuration guides, network diagrams, and system specifications

data_sources.name: Vendor Resources
data_sources.description: Product manuals, vendor KB articles, and support documentation

use_cases: Find resolution steps for a specific error code or message
Locate the procedure for common tasks (password reset, VPN setup)
Search for past solutions to recurring issues

success_metrics.target: 50% reduction in time spent searching for solutions
success_metrics.measurement: Compare average search time before/after deployment

success_metrics.target: 15% increase in issues resolved without escalation

success_metrics.measurement: Track agent queries that return KB results

prerequisites: SharePoint site with IT knowledge base content
limitations: Cannot search external websites or vendor portals directly
Cannot access ITSM ticketing systems (ServiceNow, Jira) live data
Cannot execute fixes or make system changes
Quality depends on knowledge base content quality
